Reviews.Title: No USB support for Windows 7
Reviews.Author: John V.
Reviews.Content: LYD W802AJ4 2.4Ghz (4)Wireless Infrared Color Camera Set with Quad View USB DVR feature.This does not appear to work with Windows 7 Home Premium.  The system comes with SuperDVR software, and I found an updated version of the software on Q-See's website, but it only works with Vista and XP.  Unfortunately, I don't have a Vista or XP machine, and I'm not interested in upgrading to Windows 7 Professional, downloading and installing XP mode software from Microsoft, just to see if the SuperDVR software will work.There are numerous other poor reviews for this item on Amazon's website - search on LYD W802AJ4.Do not buy.
